txt.en:
'There is much to be done in Minas Tirith as we pick up the pieces. Though this was a victory, it was only nearly won.

'Many need help within the city walls. Much of the first tier has been bombarded by the Enemy and the Houses of Healing are over capacity as they treat the injured and dying. Can I count on you to assist those in need?'

<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will fail any Aiding Minas Tirith quests not yet completed for the day.</rgb>
There is much to do to aid the people in Minas Tirith after the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.
Imrahil can be found just outside the walls of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Imrahil.
Complete quests in aiding Minas Tirith after the battle ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

People who need aid after the battle may be found either in the First Circle of the city or in the Houses of Healing in the Sixth Circle.

You have been asked to aid the people of Minas Tirith as they recover from the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.

<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will fail any Aiding Minas Tirith quests not yet completed for the day.</rgb>
'Your work to rebuild Minas Tirith is much appreciated on this day. Still, there is more to be done.'
